comments.raw_text: In Firefox 3.6, hitting Cmd+A in an alert dialog would cause the whole text to be selected.  This no longer works with the new tab-modal alert dialogs.  This breaks the Cmd+A/Cmd+C shortcut to copy the contents of an alert box to the clipboard.
comments.author: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.creator: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.text: In Firefox 3.6, hitting Cmd+A in an alert dialog would cause the whole text to be selected.  This no longer works with the new tab-modal alert dialogs.  This breaks the Cmd+A/Cmd+C shortcut to copy the contents of an alert box to the clipboard.
